casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Edward GODWIN, III. No. 167P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2016. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Godwin, William Edward (III). Teresa L. Townsend, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Kristin Jo Uicker, Raleigh, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2016."
